name: FYMC PVT LTD
description: We help people to develop their behavioral and functional skills. We coach and mentor the leaders and managers. We provide online and onsite learning programs for the organizations. 2500 Plus clients have experienced FYMC HR services.
features: Provide Personality Enrichment Area for Executives
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Talent Management Organization
ShortDescription: We are a talent management company. People are the highest asset for any organization. We support organizations to acquire right talents and enrich them.
enhanced_description: FYMC PVT LTD is a talent management organization, established in 1999 and headquartered in Chennai. They specialize in comprehensive HR services designed to enhance human capital within organizations. Their core offerings include developing behavioral and functional skills, coaching and mentoring leaders and managers, and providing both online and onsite learning programs. FYMC also focuses on individual growth through personality discovery (e.g., via PPT) and providing personality enrichment areas for executives. With over 2500 clients, their services aim to accelerate skill development, improve learning efficiency, and enable faster and more efficient talent acquisition, supporting organizations in acquiring and enriching their talent.
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive Coaching Scope (from workmen to CEO)
Flexible Learning Delivery (online and onsite programs)
Focus on both behavioral and functional skill development
roi_benefits: Faster and More Efficient Talent Acquisition
